Title: Relates to the content of statements of campaign receipts, contributions, transfers and expenditures to and by political committees
Summary: Relates to the content of statements of campaign receipts, contributions, transfers and expenditures to and by political committees; requires such statements to include the occupation of the contributor, and in certain cases such person's employer and business address.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to the content of statements of campaign receipts, contributions, transfers and expenditures to and by political committees
